title: Newcastle v Nottingham Forest, Everton v Crystal Palace and more: Premier League clockwatch – live
summary: Rob Smyth will provide live updates and goal highlights from four Premier League matches. Fans can follow along for real-time news and scores. Stay tuned for an engaging commentary experience.

title: Gaza ceasefire talks live: Hamas keen to reach a deal, says official, as Israeli attacks continue
summary: Despite former President Trump's plea for Israel to "immediately stop the bombing," reports of fatal attacks in Gaza persist. The ongoing violence has raised concerns and calls for a ceasefire. The situation remains tense as casualties continue to mount.

title: Singapore Grand Prix 2025: F1 – live
summary: Dominic Booth provides a lap-by-lap report on the race at Marina Bay, focusing on pole-sitter George Russell. The article explores whether Russell can maintain his lead against several title contenders. Fans can follow the thrilling action as the race unfolds.

title: Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe 2025: horse racing – live
summary: Flat racing is set to take place at Longchamp, marking a significant day in the racing calendar. Tony Paley will provide rolling updates throughout the event. Expect highlights and key moments from this major racing occasion.

title: Ipswich savour first derby win over Norwich in 16 years
summary: Ipswich Town secured their first victory in the East Anglia derby against Norwich City since 2009, triumphing with a score of 3-1 at Portman Road. The match marked a significant milestone for Ipswich fans after years of rivalry. This win boosts Ipswich's confidence in the league.
